fields.description:
Steps To Reproduce:
1. Launch KS on Device
2. Controls > Text Field > Events
3. Click Focus

Actual:
The keyboard is not invoked

Expected:
To invoke the keyboard

Note: 
On iPad 3 (5.1) the keyboard is displayed and then auto hides
fields.summary: MobileWeb: Textfield: Android Browser Giving focus to a text field does not invoke the keyboard

comments.body: Unfortunately I was unable to find a way to fix this, and it doesn't look like anyone else figured out a way to fix it either.
